update submission
status = #{status},
time_used = #{timeUsed},
memory_used = #{memoryUsed},
error_message = #{errorMessage},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select s.id, s.user_id, s.problem_id, s.contest_id, s.submit_time, s.language, s.code, s.status, s.result, s.time_used, s.memory_used, s.error_message, u.username, p.title from submission s left join user u on s.user_id = u.id left join problem p on s.problem_id = p.id where s.id = #{id}
